Black Shark FunCooler Pro BR20 Mobile Cooler

The BlackShark FunCooler Pro as an actual household refrigerator, combines a freezer chip and turbo fan to effectively ice down the temperatures by 14℃ in just one minute, which is good for promoting phone gaming performance, helping you freely play your games. Fun Cooler Pro enables tremendous temperature drop for a heating device thanks to the advanced TEC (Thermoelectric Cooling) technology. Its various device capability and friendly APP management make Fun Cooler Pro a unique gaming accessory and a must-have item for all gamers. It has a sleek and portable design with 91 metal allow heat dissipation columns packed into a tight frame, the device is well crafted but also super portable. the pearl white color and frame shape design is inspired by spacecrafts. It is built for secure fit with a spring loaded mechanism that allows you to quickly snap the FunCooler on. Silicon non-slip mats give a constant and firm grip to either side of the phone while protecting the phone surface.

Technology features

Black Shark FunCooler Pro BR20 Mobile Cooler ensures swift temperature drop thanks to the advanced TEC Technology – Adaptable to various smartphone models in width between 67mm-88mm Apple or Android phones just by an APP management. It has Bluetooth 4.2 connectivity, type-C charging port, bluetooth indicator and also RGB System Supported for iOS and Android.

Cooling features

The Black Shark FunCooler Pro BR20 Mobile Cooler is a must when you really want to experience the most from phone games with high graphics settings. It is only a matter of time before your phone starts burning back, but with Black Shark FunCooler Pro BR20 Mobile Cooler you can cool down your phone from 14 degree celsius within just one minute. The cooler is built to work user-friendly and it also does not produce any annoying noise while at working mode and has a high speed fan spinning of up to 6200RPM.

full_description:
Realme Cooling Back Clip Neo Mobile Cooler

The Realme Cooling Back Clip Neo Mobile Cooler is a smart solution designed to meet the demands of current mobile games and heavy device usage. Engineered with fast cooling in mind, it uses modern semiconductor technology to quickly remove heat from your mobile device, guaranteeing constant and effective temperature control even during extended gaming sessions or resource-intensive jobs. Despite its tremendous cooling capabilities, the cooler runs with whisper-quiet efficiency, keeping the immersive experience of gaming or multimedia consumption while eliminating needless noise disturbances. The Realme Cooling Back Clip Neo's semiconductor-enhanced heat dissipation mechanism demonstrates its cutting-edge design. Using semiconductor materials, the cooler allows for quick heat transfer away from the device, successfully preventing overheating and maintaining peak performance levels. This not only improves the user experience by assuring smoother gameplay and multitasking, but it also helps to extend the life of your mobile device by reducing temperature stress on its internal components. One of the most notable features of the Realme Cooling Back Clip Neo is its wide compatibility, which caters to both iOS and Android users. Whether you have the newest iPhone or an Android smartphone, this cooler works effortlessly with your device, providing cooling advantages without any compatibility issues. Its flexible design fits mobile phones with widths ranging from 64mm to 85mm, enabling compatibility with a wide range of smartphones on the market. The Realme Cooling Back Clip Neo has a stylish and ergonomic design that compliments the aesthetics of current smartphones. Its lightweight and small design makes it simple to attach and remove from your smartphone, allowing for hassle-free use while on the road. Furthermore, the clip-on design assures secure attachment without restricting port or button access, allowing for easy device use. The Realme Cooling Back Clip Neo Mobile Cooler represents a convergence of advanced cooling technology, versatile compatibility, and user-centric design.

full_description:
OnePlus Gaming Triggers

OnePlus Gaming Triggers ensure rapid responsiveness to in-game actions thanks to tactile buttons that use capacitive conduction. They are inspired by e-sports gaming mice and use Omron switches to provide precise tactile feedback, enhancing the immersive gaming experience. These triggers can easily adapt to a wide range of Android and iOS smartphones, accommodating screen protectors and protective cases. As the triggers are side-independent, users can use them on either the left or right side of their device, giving them flexibility and ease of use. Mobile games have become an essential component of the youth lifestyle. The OnePlus Gaming Trigger is mainly built for users of Battle Royale-style multiplayer mobile games such as PUBG, Call of Duty, Free Fire, and others.

Screen Response Conduction

OnePlus Gaming Triggers enable swift response to in-game actions through tactile buttons that engage with your device display via capacitive conduction.

Tactile Feedback Designed for e-sports

The OnePlus Gaming Triggers utilize Omron switches, akin to those found in e-sports gaming mouse products, to offer users enhanced tactile feedback aligned with in-game actions.

Adaptable to Multiple Smartphones

The OnePlus Gaming Triggers are crafted with adaptability, seamlessly adjusting to accommodate a diverse range of Android and iOS mobile phones, even when equipped with screen protectors and protective cases. The maximum device thickness required for compatibility is 11.5 mm.

Side Independence

The OnePlus Gaming Triggers offer independent usage for each trigger, allowing placement on either the left or right-hand side of your device for versatile gaming control.

full_description:
OnePlus PCV02 18W Freezing Point Phone Cooler

The OnePlus PCV02 18W Freezing Point Phone Cooler back clip is the industry leader in cooling power, using 18W of high power (10W in the industry), and is fitted with a newly customized aerospace-grade twin TEC cooling chip for game scenes. The lowest temperature that the monomer can withstand is -3°C, and the OnePlus Freezing Point Phone Cooler can be cooled to 25°C in 60 seconds. Under stress, the mobile phone's side frame may cool down quickly by a maximum of 13°C, and the positive cooling can reach 15°C. The OnePlus 18W freezing point cooling clip also offers a more intelligent Low Noise experience. The cooling back clip begins to operate automatically without needing to be manually operated once the clip is opened.Enjoy a consistent, full-frame-rate gaming experience throughout.The OnePlus PCV02 18W Freezing Point Phone Cooler has 284 PN junctions, an 1800 mm2 super-large cooling plate, and two thermoelectric coolers (two TECs) with an ultra-high energy efficiency ratio.

Cooling Ceiling

The OnePlus PCV02 18W Freezing Point Phone Cooler has 1000 series aluminum alloys with thermal conductivity and specially made tornado radiators. To keep your phone cool while you play games, the heat-dissipating aluminum material has a conductivity of up to 200 W/mK.
